reporter_caption.center: ROGERS v. McKEAN TSP OF THE COUNTY OF ERIE, 577 Pa. 729 (2004)

caption.center: ALAN F. ROGERS AND WENDY G. ROGERS, HIS WIFE, Respondents v. McKEAN
TOWNSHIP OF THE COUNTY OF ERIE AND COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA,

court.center: Supreme Court of Pennsylvania, Western District.

opinion.posture: No. 635 636 WAL 2003, Petition for Allowance of Appeal from the Order of the Commonwealth Court.
opinion.opinion_text: AND NOW, this 31st day of March 2004, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is denied.
